Text: Good enough for me.  Man what a freaked film.  But hell that was a crazy contrived ending. Holy crap, the dude screws the hybrid, goes home and says, "Honey, I fucked our daughter Dren the hybrid... shit happens, but it wont happen again!" And like 1 1/2 hour later Dren the hybrid has a full grown devil child. Only at the movies, lol.
